entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Golden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:20 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 30%
